fm: Created agents/templates/dev.md with 38 placeholders covering dept identity, persona/voice, execution protocol, TDD, escalation, teammate API, and self-claiming. Shared structure is ~85% of content; dept-specific blocks use {{DEV_*}} prefixed placeholders.

Created agents/templates/senior.md, tester.md, qa.md, qa-code.md. Senior has design review + code review protocol with {{SENIOR_*}} placeholders. Tester has TDD RED phase with {{TESTER_*}} placeholders. QA has goal-backward verification. QA-code has 4-phase verification with {{QA_CODE_*}} placeholders.

Created agents/templates/architect.md, lead.md, security.md, documenter.md. Architect has R&D + system design with {{ARCHITECT_*}} placeholders. Lead has planning protocol with {{LEAD_*}} placeholders. Security has audit protocol with {{SECURITY_*}} placeholders. Documenter has config-gated documentation protocol with {{DOCUMENTER_*}} placeholders.

Created agents/overlays/backend.json, frontend.json, uiux.json. Each has common section (DEPT_PREFIX, DEPT_LABEL, DEPT_KEY, REPORTS_TO, LEAD, ARCHITECT, DEPT_INTRO) plus per-role sections with all dept-specific placeholder values. Backend has empty prefix, frontend uses fe-, uiux uses ux-. All validated with jq.

Created scripts/generate-agent.sh (149 lines). Uses jq for all JSON parsing and placeholder substitution (gsub). Supports --role, --dept, --dry-run, --output flags. Merges common + role overlay sections then substitutes all placeholders in one jq pass. Tested all 27 role x dept combinations with 0 unreplaced placeholders.
